extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Version of Nextcloud
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the currently installed version of Nextcloud Server or Nextcloud Enterprise Server to assess if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version of Nextcloud affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Nextcloud to Patched Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Nextcloud Server or Nextcloud Enterprise Server to the latest patched versions: 26.0.13, 27.1.8, or 28.0.4, as recommended by CERT-EU.
